column1: Table 3-11:  CO2, CH4, and N2O Emissions from Fossil Fuel Combustion by End-Use Sector (MMT CO2 Eq.)

column2: Notes: Totals may not sum due to independent rounding. Emissions from fossil fuel combustion by electric power are allocated based on aggregate national electricity use by each end-use sector.
a U.S. Territories are not apportioned by sector, and emissions are total greenhouse gas emissions from all fuel combustion sources.
